album.title: Grandmix: The Summer Edition (Mixed by Ben Liebrand) (disc 1)

track.name: Mr. Loverman
comments: DOPE TRACK! BRINGIN BACK MEMORIES
I LOVE THIS SHIT AND IM NOT EVEN JAMAICAN LOL
żaba! żaba! żaba!
I forgot all about this song until i heard a preview of it on American Idol. This song use to be HOT back in the day. I love it lol : )
Shabba & Deborahe Glasgow  killed it  ......... the vocals are powerful .... memories galore ..
SHABBA!!!! - im sure thats Maxi Priest that shouts that??
I agree "the good oldays"
Damn the good ol days!.......I cant help but reminisce!!!
Shaba is quite an icon. Jamaicans are not all Reggae
Love how the ladies would move to this...
This is dedicated to you know who!! lol
classic!!!!
This old school tune gets any age dancing.  Just wonderful!
this man is de origenal ox
"My all time jam...MR.LOVERMAN...i stayd partyn' 2 this song at the reggae club bck n the day...time sure fliez"
I don't remember saying I love this.
As soon as I heard 2 words of that intro I knew the rest of the lyrics.
can't help but think of that 'in living color' skit when i hear this haha
One of my fav songs as a child!
l-l-l-l-lover lover lover lover lover
